presentation.name: CARLOS SAN MARTÍN TRUJILLO
presentation.description:
More than 10 years of experience working as a Front End developer.

Oriented to precision, concern for aesthetics and with a proactive approach to operate both independently and in multidisciplinary team environments (Backend, Devops, UX etc.)

In my work career, I have been part of multiple projects in various companies in the field of E-commerce, Retail, Multinational Consulting Companies, Airlines, communications, design agencies, educational institutions, government institutions, among others.

I am passionate about web development and design, I enjoy working as a team to achieve quality results, I consider myself to have the ability to learn quickly and adapt to new environments, which has allowed me to successfully face technical challenges and deliver projects with great results.

Excellent interpersonal relationships, organization and management of agile methodologies.

cencosud.name: CENCOSUD S.A. FOR EASY.CL WEBSITE
cencosud.position: FRONT END DEVELOPER WEB / MOBILE / UI
cencosud.description:
IBM WEBSPHERE COMMERCE
Front end development cell member for maintenance and evolutionary developments for E-commerce IBM www.easy.cl
  • Responsible for UI Development, layout and integration of easy.cl website re-design. Front team member to improve the website's user experience. Support and UI development for IBM ECommerce platform
  • Responsible for Development, maintenance and evolutionary for React Headless project (Headless commerce is based on an architecture where front end and back end work independently. The system to send content consists of using APIS connected to elastic Search with data loaded from IBM commerce databases)

    Tools used: React JS (class Components), javascript, API Rest, Jquery , AWS, CI/CD, Elastic Search, Kibana, App Search, Git, HTML5, CSS3, Agile methodologies, JIRA, Vs Code

VTEX COMMERCE
Front end Cell Member for maintenance and evolutionary developments for E-commerce VTEX www.easy.cl
  • Responsible for UI Development, layout and integration of re- easy.cl website design. Maintenance and evolution for the VTEX ECommerce platform
  • React Headless Checkout project development manager (Consumption of content via APIS connected to a BFF with data loaded from the Commerce VTEX databases)

    Tools used: React JS (Function Components), Clean Architecture, javascript, API Rest, AWS, Git, CI/CD, HTML5, CSS3, Design System, Styled-components, Story Books, Atomic Design , Agile methodologies, JIRA, Vs Code
